predictions.text: At the September 2025 FOMC meeting, the Federal Reserve will lower the federal funds target range by at least 25 basis points.
predictions.verification_criteria: The post-meeting statement on federalreserve.gov and the H.15 release show the federal funds target range at least 25 bps lower than immediately prior to the meeting.
monitoring_signals: Core PCE and CPI surprises vs consensus
Fed funds futures implied cut probabilities
predictions.rationale: Cooling growth and Powell’s guidance increase odds of a precautionary cut absent inflation upside surprises.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-24 close to 2025-09-30 close, iShares Russell 2000 (IWM) will outperform SPDR S&P 500 (SPY) by at least 2.5 percentage points based on adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using adjusted close data (e.g., Yahoo Finance), compute percentage returns from 2025-08-24 close to 2025-09-30 close; IWM return minus SPY return is ≥ 2.5 percentage points.
monitoring_signals: Credit conditions for small caps (bank lending surveys)
predictions.rationale: Prospective rate cuts and broader breadth support mean reversion favoring small caps over megacaps.

predictions.text: U.S. total nonfarm payrolls change for August 2025 (preliminary) will be between +100,000 and +200,000 jobs.
predictions.verification_criteria: BLS Employment Situation report’s first release: the headline change in total nonfarm payroll employment (seasonally adjusted) for August 2025 falls within +100k to +200k.
monitoring_signals: ISM services and manufacturing employment indices
predictions.rationale: Softening demand and tighter labor supply point to a moderate, below-trend payroll gain.

predictions.text: The Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) will close above 22.5 at least once by 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Cboe official historical data shows VIX daily close > 22.5 on any trading day on or before 2025-09-30.
predictions.rationale: Late-cycle fragility and key macro events raise the likelihood of a volatility spike.

predictions.text: ICE Brent front-month futures will settle at or above $94.00 per barrel at least once by 2025-10-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Intercontinental Exchange official daily settlement price for the front-month Brent contract reaches or exceeds $94.00/bbl on or before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: EIA crude and product inventory changes
predictions.rationale: Geopolitical risks and potential supply tightness can push Brent into the mid-$90s.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-30, the ICE BofA US High Yield Option-Adjusted Spread (FRED: BAMLH0A0HYM2) will be at least 30 basis points higher than on 2025-08-23.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare the series value on FRED for 2025-09-30 (or nearest prior business day available) to the value for 2025-08-23 (or 2025-08-22 if needed); increase ≥ 0.30 percentage points.
predictions.rationale: Softening demand and risk appetite fragility tend to widen high-yield risk premia.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, the U.S. SEC will publish an Investor Alert or press release warning about unauthorized special purpose vehicles (SPVs) or secondary share sales related to private AI companies.
predictions.verification_criteria: An item on sec.gov (Press Releases or Investor Alerts/Bulletins) explicitly warns about unauthorized SPVs or secondary offerings involving private AI firms.
monitoring_signals: Media coverage of AI-related SPVs and secondary sales
SEC enforcement actions or risk alerts concerning private offerings
Investor complaints and state regulator notices
Marketing by unregistered intermediaries on social media
Fundraising activity at large private AI companies
predictions.rationale: High investor demand and opacity around AI unicorn access raise regulatory warning odds.
